name: JONI AUTO RENTALS, INC. d/b/a Thrifty Rent-a-Car Systems v. John A. NORBERG, Tax Administrator
name_abbreviation: Joni Auto Rentals, Inc. v. Norberg

parties: JONI AUTO RENTALS, INC. d/b/a Thrifty Rent-a-Car Systems v. John A. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted without prejudice, however, to respondent’s raising in his brief and at oral argument the issue of the timeliness of the petition.

attorneys: Vrana, Cunha & Esposito, Dennis H. Es-posito, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer, Division of Taxation, North Kingstown, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
JONI AUTO RENTALS, INC. d/b/a Thrifty Rent-a-Car Systems v. John A. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 82-279-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 9, 1982.
Vrana, Cunha & Esposito, Dennis H. Es-posito, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer, Division of Taxation, North Kingstown, for respondent.
